plot: Grandad has suddenly, tragically died, and Del and Rodney attend his funeral and mingle with the North London branch of the Trotter family. Once the wake at the flat is over, they discover that one member of their extended clan has quietly stayed on incognito: Grandad's brother, Navy veteran Uncle Albert. When they find out that Albert is now homeless, Del and Rodney face a moral dilemma that tests their resolve with this cunning, salty old sea-dog.—stevecann2003
